name: BEATROOT (Bardia Eghbali, fabulous_lera, codingoat)
description:
A Global Game Jam 2023 Submission

Beat root vegetables as a beetroot in a beat-focused beat'em up game.

Made by:

  • Bardia Eghbali
  • Lera Nikitina
  • Zsombor Szabo

Attributions:

MIMIDEATH - if god didnt want us to snort worms why did he make them cylindrical
MUST DIE!, Akeos, Skream, Habstrakt - LOL OK! (Habstrakt remix)
Schwank, Lil Triangle - Extra Credit On The Chromosome Test! Victory Royale!!!
